title: SMC_GExpToken_Iterator (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL SMC_GExpToken_Iterator
This iterator allows to iterate all g-expression tokens of a g-word.
It can be retrieved from a gword-iterator
(
SMC_GWord_Iterator.GetGExpTokenIterator
).
For each token, the additional data can be queried.
Methods:
Advance
GetAddData
GetCount
GetValue
Init
IsValid
Structure:
Advance (Method)
GetAddData (Method)
GetCount (Method)
GetValue (Method)
Init (Method)
IsValid (Method)
